ValidationRule.description: A DS Quote/Proposal cannot be accepted without having PO Number, PO date and - only in case of Project mode - Nokia Customer Document ID fields filled.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Quote_Type__c = 'Direct DS', ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c, 'Accepted'), ISCHANGED(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c), OR( ISBLANK(Apttus_QPConfig__PONumber__c), ISBLANK(Apttus_QPConfig__PODate__c), IF( ISPICKVAL(Contract_Type_Name__c, 'Project'), ISBLANK(Nokia_Customer_Document_ID__c), False ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Mandatory fields are missing (PO Number, PO Date or Nokia Customer Document ID)
